content: this adorable easter peep is a no sew quick work up that is guaranteed to be a hit i used sweet snuggles lite and a size 6 0mm hook but gauge does not matter and any yarn and appropriate hook size will work less than half a skein is used for these adorable little peeps so they re a great stash buster eyes are 10 0mm safety eyes and nose is 8 0mm but all 10 0mms or all 8 0mm would also do
